project_descr: PIMS 3929 SCCF FSP Integrating Climate Change Risks into Water and Flood Management by Vulnerable Mountainous Communities in the Greater Caucasus Region.

outputs.output_descr: Project aims to reduce vulnerability of the mountain communities of the Greater Caucasus region of Azerbaijan to climate change induced water stress and flood hazards by improved water and flood management.

document_name: Integrating Climate change Risks into Water and Flood Management by Vulnerable Mountainous Communities in the Greater Caucasus
Integrating Climate Change Risks into Water and Flood Management
ITB for Meteorological and Hydro-meterological Gauging Station
project_title: integrating climate change risks into water and flood management by vulnerable mountainous communities in the greater caucasus region
